newsitem.title: USA: World Airways says resolves PAL issues.
newsitem.headline: World Airways says resolves PAL issues.

text.p: World Airways Inc said on Monday it successfully resolved contractual issues with Philippine Airlines and it expects no material change in its financial results.

World said in a news release that it received a substantial paymment from Philippines Airlines, known as PAL, on July 11, and that PAL reconfirmed its commitment to bring current all amounts owed to World within the next several days.

PAL had withheld lease payments for four aircraft as a result of the dispute. World said it would shift two MD-11s from PAL to another World customer later in the third quarter, and PAL agreed to operate two other aircraft currently in its fleet until February 1998.
